languages.text: "Амбуллы. Эти твари ориентируются по вибрациям земли. Все на ящики, или мы станем легкой добычей!"

traits.locale_text: "Амбуллы. Эти твари ориентируются по вибрациям земли. Все на ящики, или мы станем легкой добычей!"

languages.text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"
languages.original_text: "Амбуллы. Эти твари ориентируются по вибрациям земли. Все на ящики, или мы станем легкой добычей!"

traits.locale_text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"
"Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"
"Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"

"Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"
"Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"

languages.text: 「アンブルだ。あいつらは地面の振動を感知して移動する。全員、木箱の上に登れ。さもないと、奴らの格好の獲物になるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"

traits.locale_text: 「アンブルだ。あいつらは地面の振動を感知して移動する。全員、木箱の上に登れ。さもないと、奴らの格好の獲物になるぞ！」

languages.text: "Ambullen. Diese Kreaturen navigieren, indem sie Vibrationen im Boden spüren. Alle auf die Kisten, sonst sind wir leichte Beute für sie!"
languages.original_text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"

traits.locale_text: "Ambullen. Diese Kreaturen navigieren, indem sie Vibrationen im Boden spüren. Alle auf die Kisten, sonst sind wir leichte Beute für sie!"

languages.text: « Des ambulls. Ces créatures se servent des vibrations dans le sol pour se repérer. Que tout le monde monte sur les caisses, ou nous ferons des proies faciles ! »
languages.original_text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"

traits.locale_text: « Des ambulls. Ces créatures se servent des vibrations dans le sol pour se repérer. Que tout le monde monte sur les caisses, ou nous ferons des proies faciles ! »

languages.text: «Ambulls. Estos seres captan las vibraciones del suelo. ¡Que todo el mundo se suba a una caja o seremos presas fáciles para ellos!».
languages.original_text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"

traits.locale_text: «Ambulls. Estos seres captan las vibraciones del suelo. ¡Que todo el mundo se suba a una caja o seremos presas fáciles para ellos!».

languages.text: “是蚁牛，这些东西会通过地面的震动确定猎物的位置。所有人，赶紧爬到箱子上面，否则会被它们轻而易举干掉！”
languages.original_text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"

traits.locale_text: “是蚁牛，这些东西会通过地面的震动确定猎物的位置。所有人，赶紧爬到箱子上面，否则会被它们轻而易举干掉！”

languages.text: "Ambullar... Yerdeki titreşimleri hissederek yön bulur. Çabuk, kasaların üstüne çıkın! Yoksa çiğ çiğ yerler bizi!"
languages.original_text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"

traits.locale_text: "Ambullar... Yerdeki titreşimleri hissederek yön bulurlar. Çabuk, kasaların üstüne çıkın, yoksa çiğ çiğ yerler bizi!"

languages.original_text: "Ambulls. These things navigate by sensing vibrations in the ground. Everyone, get on top of the crates, or we'll be easy prey for them!"
